metadata.Title: CVE-2017-0532 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An information disclosure vulnerability in the MediaTek video codec driver could enable a local malicious application to access data outside of its permission levels. This issue is rated as Moderate because it first requires compromising a privileged process. Product: Android. Versions: N/A. Android ID: A-32370398. References: M-ALPS03069985.

criterions.comment: linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
